text: Jo log iman latey hain, unka haami o madadgaar Allah hai aur woh unko tareekiyon (andhere) se roshni mein nikaal laata hai aur jo log kufr ki raah ikhtiyar karte hain unke haami o madadgaar taagut hain aur woh unhein roshni se tareekiyon ki tafaf khench le jatay hain, yeh aag mein janey waley log hain jahan yeh hamesha rahenge
